brewery.brewery_description: Our beers are natural, reflecting the unique ambience of the island itself... a haven where nature still holds sway, where traditional values are still nurtured. Arran Premium ales are pure - free of artificial additives and preservatives. Arran Premium ales are produced with care and pride

items.checkin_comment: Remember this being tasty, and wasn't disappointed

items.badge_description: Is the ship swaying or did you just have one too many? Hope you don't get sea sick! That's a check-in at 20 different places categorized as a Boat / Ferry or Harbour / Marina. Visit 5 more for Level 5!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 405 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 82!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 110 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 23!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

beer.beer_description: A self-proclaimed American style IPA with attitude.
A smooth malty brew with a pleasant hop character. Fireside has a bitter sweet finish with a hint of ginger.
Session ipa with a citrus dry finish

Every year we allow our versatile house yeast to go to Valhalla in a blaze of glory, producing the strongest, darkest Stout that we can fit into our kit. The resulting brew was infused with our very own OPA blend from the Arran Coffee Company to create a brew that Odin himself would smile upon. SKOL!
A blonde premium craft beer is a product of its place.  It combines substance with zest and freshness.  Contains malted barley and wheat.

Kolsch style ale with lemon.
Very light, citric and refreshing. A good one for sunny days.
Red session ale with a light body, pleasant bitterness and grapefruit aroma. First one of the Zodiac series from Arran Brewery Co.
